original_text: But it happened that a priest from the temple was going down that road. He saw the man, who was lying there. But he walked past him on the other side of the road.
korean_text: 마침 한 제사장이 그 길로 내려가다가 그를 보고 피하여 지나가고

sentences.original_text: But it happened that a priest from the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 성전의 한 제사장이 그 길을 내려가다가

sentences.original_text: He saw the man, who was lying there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거기에 누워 있는 남자를 보았다.

sentences.original_text: on the other side of the road.
